messages: 1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:46): I know this is an HTML5 channel however I build with non HTML5 elements all day and never have a problem getting things working in IE6 -- conditional comments on the html helps though so I can easily over write something for .ie6
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (03:48): 1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76: "never have a problem" ? what about <select> under lightbox ? :)
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:49): lol luckily i don't run into that!
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:49): although there are ways around that
24abb8f1ed61411f16f17091cf3683de (03:51): In html(5), I don't need to write <br> as <br/>, right?
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:51): <br /> is XHTML and <br> is standard HTML
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:52): both are acceptable -- I still write typically with XHTML semantics
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:52): that's how I learned and its easier for me
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (03:52): keeping some XHTML syntax is good imo
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (03:52): i still do trailing slashes on br and images
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (03:53): I'm scared that in HTML5 <IMG SRC=""> is valid
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (03:53): everyone knows the hardcore coders never hit space
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (03:54): even for text strings, they do %20's
19685048ab49226517b9e214a6e971f6 (03:59): fancybox not working in ie6 i think
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (04:04): What are you guys using in a HTML5 world tag wise for sidebars?
1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (04:05): I have been using div#sidbar still

1c4a54387dccd59b38ed2dc5cbf5ef76 (04:06): theoretically asides are suppose to have relevance to the article/post/page which most of my sidebars don't -- they are typically related to the site but not specifically to the page
24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 (04:15): 4AM, boss came back to the office with 2 drunk customers
